:我又回来了
:这次我带来了我的新地图:

[fly]Sky Parkour V4.0 Part 2 -- Lighting Purgatory[/fly]

:本地图需要特定材质包:http://pan.baidu.com/s/1eSA67eU

:它依然是在"Sky"系列里的
:本地图请在1.11.2下游玩

:下面是介绍

关卡:101.Welcome To The Purgatory 102.Die. 103.Are You Feeling Bored? 104.Are You Feeling Angry? 105.Are You Feeling Crazy?106.Elytra 2 107.Elytra 3 108.Elytra 4 109.Elytra 5 110.EEElllyyytttrrraaa
111.Version Upgrade 112.Question 2 113.RedStone 3 114.Color Run EP.2[Yellow.Green.Cyan.Blue] 115.Color Run EP.3[Blue.Purple.Red]
116.Color Run EP.STEND[Rainbow] 117.Escape The Room demo(This is my next map's name.) 118.The Portal 2 119.Nether 2 120.A Big Maze
